name: proteins_api_get_protein
description: Get comprehensive protein information from Proteins API by UniProt accession. Returns protein annotations, sequences, features, and cross-references.

accession.description: UniProt protein accession (e.g., 'P05067', 'P04637'). Use UniProt search or ebi_search_domain with domain='uniprot' to find valid accessions.

format.description: Response format. JSON is recommended for most use cases.

data.description: Complete protein information including annotations, sequences, features, and cross-references.

url.description: Final request URL used for the API call.

name: proteins_api_get_variants
description: Get variation data for a protein including ClinVar, COSMIC, and other variant annotations. Note: Variations endpoint may not be available for all proteins. If this returns 404, use proteins_api_get_protein instead which includes variant information. Returns variant information with clinical significance and population frequencies.

accession.description: UniProt protein accession (e.g., 'P05067', 'P04637'). Use UniProt search or ebi_search_domain with domain='uniprot' to find valid accessions.

format.description: Response format. JSON is recommended for most use cases.

data.description: List of protein variations with clinical significance and population frequencies.

url.description: Final request URL used for the API call.

name: proteins_api_get_proteomics
description: Get proteomics data for a protein including mass spectrometry evidence, PTM sites, and expression data. Note: This tool extracts proteomics-related data from the main protein endpoint (the separate proteomics endpoint is not available). Returns PTM comments, modified residues, and related features.

accession.description: UniProt protein accession (e.g., 'P05067', 'P04637'). Use UniProt search or ebi_search_domain with domain='uniprot' to find valid accessions.

format.description: Response format. JSON is recommended for most use cases.

data.description: Proteomics data including PTM comments, modified residues, and related features.

count.description: Number of proteomics data items returned.

url.description: Final request URL used for the API call.

fallback_used.description: Indicates whether data was extracted from the main protein endpoint (true) or returned from a separate endpoint (false).

note.description: Additional information about how the data was retrieved.

name: proteins_api_get_epitopes
description: Get epitope sequences for a protein. Returns B-cell and T-cell epitope information with antigenicity predictions. Note: This tool extracts epitope-related data from the main protein endpoint (the separate epitopes endpoint is not available). Returns immunology comments and epitope features if present.

accession.description: UniProt protein accession (e.g., 'P05067', 'P04637'). Use UniProt search or ebi_search_domain with domain='uniprot' to find valid accessions.

format.description: Response format. JSON is recommended for most use cases.

data.description: Epitope sequences and annotations including immunology comments and epitope features.

url.description: Final request URL used for the API call.

fallback_used.description: Indicates whether data was extracted from the main protein endpoint (true) or returned from a separate endpoint (false).

note.description: Additional information about how the data was retrieved.

name: proteins_api_search
description: Search proteins in Proteins API. Returns search results matching the query. Note: The Proteins API search endpoint may have limitations. For reliable protein search, consider using ebi_search_domain with domain='uniprot' instead. This tool attempts to search by name or accession, but may not work for all query types.

query.description: Search query (e.g., protein name, gene name, organism). Internally converted to 'q' parameter for Proteins API.

format.description: Response format. JSON is recommended for most use cases.

data.description: Search results containing protein entries matching the query.

url.description: Final request URL used for the API call.

name: proteins_api_get_genome_mappings
description: Get reference genome mappings for a protein using the Proteins API. This extracts genome-related cross-references (Ensembl, RefSeq, EMBL, GenBank) from the main protein endpoint, which may contain genomic location information. Note: The separate genome endpoint is not available, so this tool extracts genome-related cross-references from the main protein data. Use UniProt or EBI Search (domain='uniprot') to find accessions such as 'P05067' or 'P04637'.

accession.description: UniProt protein accession (e.g., 'P05067', 'P04637'). Use UniProt search or ebi_search_domain with domain='uniprot' to find valid accessions.

format.description: Response format. JSON is recommended for most use cases.

data.description: List of genome mapping records for the requested protein.

url.description: Final request URL used for the API call.

fallback_used.description: Indicates whether data was extracted from the main protein endpoint (true) or returned from a separate endpoint (false).

note.description: Additional information about how the data was retrieved.

name: proteins_api_get_features
description: Get detailed sequence features for a protein, including domains, regions, motifs, modified residues, and other annotated features. Note: This tool extracts features from the main protein endpoint (the separate features endpoint is not available). Returns all sequence feature annotations for the protein.

accession.description: UniProt protein accession (e.g., 'P05067', 'P04637'). Use UniProt search or ebi_search_domain with domain='uniprot' to find valid accessions.

format.description: Response format. JSON is recommended for most use cases.

data.description: List of sequence feature annotations for the requested protein.

url.description: Final request URL used for the API call.

fallback_used.description: Indicates whether data was extracted from the main protein endpoint (true) or returned from a separate endpoint (false).

note.description: Additional information about how the data was retrieved.

name: proteins_api_get_xrefs
description: Get cross-references for a protein from the Proteins API, including links to other databases (Ensembl, PDB, Reactome, EMBL, RefSeq, etc.). Note: This tool extracts cross-references from the main protein endpoint (the separate xrefs endpoint is not available). Returns database cross-reference records.

accession.description: UniProt protein accession (e.g., 'P05067', 'P04637'). Use UniProt search or ebi_search_domain with domain='uniprot' to find valid accessions.

format.description: Response format. JSON is recommended for most use cases.

data.description: List of cross-reference records for the requested protein.

url.description: Final request URL used for the API call.

fallback_used.description: Indicates whether data was extracted from the main protein endpoint (true) or returned from a separate endpoint (false).

note.description: Additional information about how the data was retrieved.

name: proteins_api_get_comments
description: Get functional annotations and comments for a protein from the Proteins API. This includes curated comments on function, subcellular location, disease involvement, and other annotations. Note: This tool extracts comments from the main protein endpoint (the separate comments endpoint is not available). Returns all functional annotation comments.

accession.description: UniProt protein accession (e.g., 'P05067', 'P04637'). Use UniProt search or ebi_search_domain with domain='uniprot' to find valid accessions.

format.description: Response format. JSON is recommended for most use cases.

data.description: List of comment/annotation records for the requested protein.

url.description: Final request URL used for the API call.

fallback_used.description: Indicates whether data was extracted from the main protein endpoint (true) or returned from a separate endpoint (false).

note.description: Additional information about how the data was retrieved.

name: proteins_api_get_publications
description: Get publications associated with a protein from the Proteins API. Returns literature references linked to the UniProt accession, including PubMed IDs and citation details. Note: This tool extracts publications from the main protein endpoint (the separate publications endpoint is not available). Returns all publication references.

accession.description: UniProt protein accession (e.g., 'P05067', 'P04637'). Use UniProt search or ebi_search_domain with domain='uniprot' to find valid accessions.

format.description: Response format. JSON is recommended for most use cases.

data.description: List of publication records associated with the requested protein.

url.description: Final request URL used for the API call.

fallback_used.description: Indicates whether data was extracted from the main protein endpoint (true) or returned from a separate endpoint (false).

note.description: Additional information about how the data was retrieved.
